title: American Revolution and establishment of the US
description: Delve into the ideological, political, and military struggles that led the thirteen American colonies to independence from Britain and the subsequent establishment of the United States.

title: French Revolution and Napoleon
description: Witness a pivotal moment in history as societal pressures erupt into revolution, reshaping the French political landscape and giving rise to Napoleon Bonaparte's empire.

title: Industrial Revolution
description: Explore the seismic shift from agrarian societies to industrial urban centers, marked by technological innovation, societal change, and a reshaped global economy.

title: World Wars: Causes, events, consequences
description: Navigate the global conflicts of the 20th century, examining the intricate causes, major events, and profound ramifications of the two World Wars.

title: Cold War: Superpowers, proxy wars, space race
description: Dive into the ideological standoff between the US and the USSR, a period marked by nuclear tensions, proxy conflicts, and a race to space.

title: Decolonization and emergence of new nations
description: Explore the post-war period where numerous nations gained independence, reshaping political borders and global dynamics in the process.
